stories.text:
I was talking with my friend about how much of a pain in the butt building k8s clusters are, and how we think working with helm charts and YAML is maybe not the greatest experience.

We brainstormed some things but the gist would be a visual drag and drop style builder, more akin to something like block based programming or like blueprints from the UNREAL game engine that handles building, deploying and monitoring. The thought would be to also generate the associated helm charts.

I put together a very quick landing page with high level explanation of what we're thinking and a generic if you want more info drop us your e-mail form:

https://www.kubelord.com/

I want to gauge interest on the idea before spending any time doing it.
stories.title: Ask HN: Any interest in a visual drag and drop K8s cluster builder?
